                                # 获取当前访问的pathname

                                # 获取当前访问的pathname

                                // 获取当前访问的pathname
const { pathname } = location
let activeUrl = pathname
let getPathName = (/(\/\w*)\//).exec(activeUrl)
activeUrl = getPathName ? getPathName[1] : activeUrl;
console.log('activeUrl:', activeUrl)
